name: For Mona Lisa
description:
The Mona Lisa is undoubtedly the simple noble painting that everyone knows about.

In our game, the Mona Lisa painting is stolen from the museum. And you, the director of the Louvre museum, go on a journey into the past to retrieve it again. But neither is the painting that hasn't been stolen in the past.

You are traveling to a time when, by accident, the Mona Lisa was hidden hundreds of years ago in an earl's castle.

Let's see what you will come across on the way, can you save the painting with the means at your disposal?

History is worth fighting for historical artifacts, but what would you sacrifice?

This game is made by Gamfed 2022  Volunteers Digital Game Development Team.

Thanks to all Beril Bayrav and all gamfed family for their support.

Gamification  & Storytelling = Mehmet Yalçın, Büşra Tatar, Nuran Savran

Level Design = Mehmet Yalçın, Büşra Tatar

Game  Develop = Büşra Tatar
